ACX.caption: Content
ACX.doc: Content to display in the editor. Can be HTML, plain text.
ACX.name: content

AFH.caption: preserveWhitespace
AFH.doc: By default, whitespace is collapsed as per HTML's rules. Pass true to preserve whitespace, but normalize newlines to spaces, and 'full' to preserve whitespace entirely.
AFH.name: parseOptions_preserveWhitespace
